name: Update emails from a Google Sheet with email status using TrueMail
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the emails by TrueMail and update the Google Sheet with the status of the emails. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FEEJk3ADEZ_JbWvizWAtVWCOB9pXT-KlWCLKoHWp50o/edit?usp=sharing).
